name: Raw Apple Cake
author: Stephanie Conley
summary: The best apple cake you have ever tasted. If desired, add 1/2 cup nuts and 1/2 cup raisins.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F(175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 9x13 inch pan
Chop apples finely and place into a large bowl
In a separate bowl, beat eggs and oil together and pour over apples
Let stand while mixing the dry ingredients
in a medium bowl, mix sugar, flour, 1 teaspoon salt, cinnamon, nutmeg and baking soda
Fold into apples, eggs and oil and mix well
Pour into prepared 9x13 inch pan, and bake at 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C) for 45 minutes
Once cool frost with Cream Cheese Icing
To Make Cream Cheese Frosting: In a medium bowl, combine cream cheese, milk, vanilla and pinch of salt
Gradually add sugar, beating until frosting is smooth
Add additional milk, 1 tablespoon at a time, until frosting is desired consistency
